thread.title: 12 escape from Limpopo police cells
thread.title_full: 12 escape from Limpopo police cells | News24

author: news24.com
title: 12 escape from Limpopo police cells
text:
Johannesburg - Twelve awaiting-trial prisoners escaped from two Limpopo police stations over the weekend.
Six escaped from the Mecklenburg police station's cells and six from Tubatse, provincial spokesperson Colonel Ronel Otto said.
In both cases they sawed through the wire mesh roof of the exercise room.
Acting provincial police commissioner major-general Lesiba Mashilo had ordered an investigation into both escapes.
